CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 18, 1939, pg. 7, reads: "Pittsburgh Debs About Town Have Kiddies' Party - Time turned backward in its wild flight Saturday evening and Pittsburgh's beautiful Debs About Town turned kiddies ... short skirts, hair ribbons, dollies, et. al. Here they are at the party in play room at Marian [Marion] Harris' ... oh, yes, the boys were there, but the male of the species do not shed the years so gracefully..."
TitMainTitle: Women, including Alice or Alyce Lindsay second from left, and Helen Phillips on right, seated on pool table at Debs About Town party in home or boxing gym of William "Woogie" Harris, Frankstown Road, Penn Hills
CatSubject_tab: Interiors--Pennsylvania--Penn Hills.Women--Pennsylvania--Penn Hills.Parties--Pennsylvania--Penn Hills.Windows--Pennsylvania--Penn Hills.Bottles--Pennsylvania--Penn Hills.
